about.banner.title: Information
about.intro.title: About Panshaker
about.intro.p1: Panshaker Services is a leader in North American restaurant automation. Our mission is to bring authentic Eastern flavors across borders so every city can enjoy great food. By integrating industrial-grade automation hardware with our own AI, we deliver reliable, efficient kitchens.
about.intro.p2: We pioneered unmanned cooking for Chinese cuisine in North America, turning uncontrollable cooking steps into standardized processes to solve high labor costs, low efficiency, inconsistent quality, and operational complexity.
about.intro.p3: We run our own brands and, through an in-store partnership and equipment subscription model, empower existing restaurants. Our edge comes from self-built wok robots, AI vision monitoring, and Synapse OS.
about.intro.p4: We will keep advancing restaurant automation, expanding from wok robots to full-stack Chinese cuisine infrastructure to lower the barrier for entrepreneurs. We use leading tech to connect the physical and digital worlds, creating value for operators and better experiences for diners.
about.team.title: Leadership
about.team.xu.name: Haoran Xu
profile.xu.name: Haoran Xu
profile.xu.p1: Haoran Xu holds a Ph.D. and M.S. in Engineering from the University of Washington, a B.S. in Mathematics from The Ohio State University, and a B.A. in Film from Northwestern University (Qatar).
profile.xu.p2: Before founding Panshaker, Haoran founded ADiB Consulting in 2023. He interned as a software engineer at Samsung China, ROHM Semiconductor China, and Hyundai AutoEver (2022-2025), interned at Hengdu Law Firm as a patent agent in 2025, and has been a CS research assistant at Ohio University since Oct 2025.
profile.sun.name: Qisheng Sun
profile.sun.p1: Qisheng Sun holds an M.S. from UC San Diego, dual B.S. degrees in Computer Science and Mathematics from Case Western Reserve University, and a Mathematics degree from Xi'an Jiaotong University.
profile.unknown.name: unknown
profile.unknown.p1: unknown holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Pennsylvania and a B.S. in Computer Science from Tianjin University.
careers.title: Careers
careers.heading: Careers
careers.role.title: Lead Field Service Technician
careers.role.overview_desc: Lead on-site installation, commissioning, and maintenance for Panshaker automated cooking systems, ensuring reliability and customer success.
careers.role.resp_1: Perform on-site installation, commissioning, and maintenance of Panshaker automated cooking equipment.
careers.role.resp_2: Diagnose technical issues and perform repairs to minimize downtime.
careers.role.resp_3: Provide training and technical support to kitchen staff.
careers.role.resp_4: Maintain detailed service logs and report on hardware performance.
